name: Crispy Calamari
description: Tender calamari rings fried to a golden crisp, served with a zesty marinara sauce.

name: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
description: A creamy blend of spinach, artichoke hearts, and parmesan cheese, served warm with toasted pita bread.

name: Spiced Shrimp Cocktail
description: Jumbo shrimp poached and chilled, served with a tangy cocktail sauce and lemon wedge.

name: Vegetable Samosas
description: Crispy fried pastries filled with a savory mix of vegetables and spices, served with a mint chutney.

name: Grilled Halloumi Skewers
description: Marinated halloumi cheese grilled on skewers and served with a drizzle of olive oil and lemon.

name: Loaded Nachos
description: Crisp tortilla chips piled high with seasoned ground beef, melted cheese, pico de gallo, and sour cream.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken marinated in a blend of spices and simmered in a creamy tomato sauce.

name: Penne Alfredo
description: Penne pasta tossed in a rich and creamy alfredo sauce with parmesan cheese.

name: Black Bean Burger
description: A hearty vegetarian burger made with black beans, corn, and spices, served on a toasted bun with your choice of toppings.

name: Salmon Teriyaki
description: Salmon fillet marinated in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, grilled to perfection and served with steamed rice and vegetables.

name: Pasta Primavera
description: A vibrant mix of seasonal vegetables tossed with pasta in a light garlic and herb sauce.

name: Lamb Curry
description: Tender lamb pieces cooked in a flavorful curry sauce with aromatic spices, served with rice and naan bread.

name: Chocolate Mousse
description: A rich and decadent chocolate mousse, topped with a swirl of whipped cream.

name: Cheesecake with Berry Compote
description: A creamy cheesecake topped with a seasonal berry compote, perfect for sharing.

name: Mango Sticky Rice
description: Steamed sticky rice served with sweet mango slices and coconut cream sauce.

name: Pecan Pie
description: A classic pecan pie with a buttery crust and a rich pecan filling.

name: Tiramisu
description: Coffee-flavored ladyfingers layered with mascarpone cheese and cocoa powder, a traditional Italian dessert.

name: Apple Crumble
description: Warm spiced apples topped with a crumbly oat topping, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Coca-Cola
description: A classic cola beverage.

name: Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed orange juice.

name: House-brewed Beer
description: A selection of craft beers on tap.

name: Pinot Noir
description: A smooth and fruity red wine.

name: Chardonnay
description: A light and refreshing white wine.

name: Caff√® Latte
description: A hot espresso drink with steamed milk and a layer of milk foam.
